trans-unit.target: 护教军在此学会的不只是如何对抗恶魔与吸血鬼，也包括对抗无知。

trans-unit.source: Gavony Township
trans-unit.target: 加渥尼镇区

trans-unit.resname: ISD·239 | Gavony Township | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ISD·239 | Gavony Township | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}{W}，{T}：在每个由你操控的生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: ISD·239 | Gavony Township | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The protective wards of the church have weakened, and no one can tell us why. It's time to look to our own defenses."\n—Gregel, militia leader
trans-unit.target: 「教会的防卫守护已经减弱，而且没人明白原因。 我们该靠自己来防卫了。」 ～民兵领袖革列格

trans-unit.source: Ghost Quarter
trans-unit.target: 魂魅城区

trans-unit.resname: ISD·240 | Ghost Quarter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy target land. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle his or her library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭目标地。 该地的操控者可以从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将它放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: ISD·240 | Ghost Quarter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Deserted, but not uninhabited.
trans-unit.target: 遭人遗弃，但并非没有居民。

trans-unit.target: 除非你操控树林或海岛，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: ISD·241 | Hinterland Harbor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.resname: ISD·241 | Hinterland Harbor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In places where the sea meets the trees, it's easy to forget the darkness that rules most of Innistrad.
trans-unit.target: 在海洋与林木交接之处，很容易忘记黑暗统治着依尼翠大部分的地区。

trans-unit.resname: ISD·242 | Isolated Chapel | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source: When a werewolf changes for the first time, that first howl is said to echo through the wilds till moonset.
trans-unit.target: 据说当狼人首度改变形体时，所发出的第一声嚎叫会在荒野萦绕不去，直到月落方歇。

trans-unit.source: "This is the price of being last in the food chain. We must keep our places of beauty hidden away instead of displayed for all to see."\n—Hildin, priest of Avacyn
